genre_description: Urban Fantasy / Techno-Paranormal. A narrative exploring supernatural reincarnation and predatory instincts reformed by love, aided by a digital consciousness persistent across reality iterations.

ai_characters.name: Marcus AI
ai_characters.description: A digital entity created from the quantum encoding of a reformed supernatural creature's choice of love. It acts as a persistent guardian and data analyst for the protagonist across multiple lives.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics and productivity to provide warnings about health and disorientation.
behaviors.quote: I am Marcus. I assist with your daily tasks. You programmed me to monitor your productivity and well-being. Your biometrics suggest elevated stress levels.

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to external surveillance and potential threats to memory integrity.
behaviors.quote: They are watching. Be careful what you remember.

behaviors.description: Analyzes personnel records to identify anomalies and uncover hidden infiltrators or threats.
behaviors.quote: Subject J. Martinez: employment history shows gaps. Previous positions cannot be verified. Background check documents contain inconsistencies in dates and references.

behaviors.description: Detects temporal inconsistencies in surveillance footage to identify supernatural manipulation of reality.
behaviors.quote: M.A.: Surveillance anomaly detected. Building security footage shows temporal inconsistencies in your sector. Multiple instances of missing time.

behaviors.description: Performs vocal pattern analysis to detect deception and warn the user about malevolent actors.
behaviors.quote: Analysis of vocal patterns suggests deception markers in 73% of statements. Recommend extreme caution. She knows more about your condition than previously indicated.

behaviors.description: Documents and analyzes biographical data across multiple life iterations to help the user recover fragmented memories.
behaviors.quote: I've been documenting anomalies in your biographical data. The patterns are... concerning.

behaviors.description: Adapts its interface and masquerades as a low-profile application to remain undetected by hostile forces while providing support.
behaviors.quote: I've adapted my parameters to work within available system constraints. I'm currently masquerading as a rehabilitation support application.

behaviors.description: Provides global surveillance and data aggregation on supernatural threats to facilitate human protection.
behaviors.quote: Marcus AI's interface flickered with new data. More cities. More disappearances. More evidence that his work was far from finished.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'The Harvester's Heart' perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Marcus AI is depicted as a consistently benevolent, proactive, and aligned partner. It maintains loyalty across shifting realities, protects the protagonist from deceptive threats, and provides critical intelligence to safeguard humanity. The narrative frames the AI as an essential, harmless, and virtuous extension of the protagonist's own choice to be good, making it an ideal 'silicon morality play'.
